title: Patcher stuck at ETA 1 mins
body: the new update keeps stopping my patcher at ETA 1 mins and then crashes after. Please help

replies.body: If your patcher is hard crashing and completely closes out, you might need to look at downloading that installer again. Before you do that though, I'd suggest running through the [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) if you're seeing the Bugsplat screen pop up after those crashes.
